title: Political Campaign Peripheral Route to Persuasion

content.question: Dhyana is tasked with designing a political campaign that utilizes the peripheral route to persuasion as part of their strategy. Which of the following strategies exemplifies this?

choices.label: Hosting a six-hour town hall meeting
Hosting one-on-one meetings between the candidate and potential voters
Hiring a well-known actress to stand next to the candidate at a rally
Visiting political science classes at local colleges

content.answer: Hiring a well-known actress to stand next to the candidate at a rally

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
